channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report X-2024010685
item.description:
Report X-2024010685

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-29T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-22
  • City: GRIMES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was discovered during trailer unload top have been stacked atop other boxes. In transit it fell on its side onto a box, jarring the cap loose and allowing product to escape. The box underneath contained medical supplies. DescribePack: The cap was loose and the protective seal was damaged allowing product to escape. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: The package was immediately removed from the work site and isolated from workers until this report could be processed.
